jv_history.source_quote: Podcast teaches the success principles and interpersonal communication skills needed to get to the top and stay there. We are dedicated to empowering life-long learners and ambitious entrepreneurs wit
ason is the Chief Administrative Officer and Consulting Practice Lead at DGCpartners LLC

what_you_do: Career development and executive coaching services.
who_you_serve: Job seekers and professionals looking to advance their careers.
social_proof: Testimonials from clients indicating success in finding new jobs and advancing their careers.
